Package hevs.gdx2d.lib

The library wrapper that is built around libgdx.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Game2D
    A wrapper for the ApplicationListener class provided for the INF1 class.
    GdxConfig
    Created by Pierre-André Mudry on 29.04.2015.
    GdxGraphics
    A game graphics implementation for LibGDX based on the interface of FunGraphics for INF1 class given at the UAS Western Switzerland, Sion.
    PortableApplication
    The base class that should be sub-classed by all gdx2d applications.
    ScreenManager
    Handles multiple rendering screens and enables transitions between those screens.
    Version
    Gets the version of the library.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ScreenManager.TransactionType
    Available screen transitions effects.

Package hevs.gdx2d.lib Description

The library wrapper that is built around libgdx.
Author:
Pierre-André Mudry
